mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment (post_id, user_id, comment_text, created_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{commentText}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.post_id AS postId, c.user_id AS userId, c.comment_text AS commentText, c.created_at AS createdAt, m.nickname AS nickname FROM Comment c JOIN Member m ON c.user_id = m.user_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.id ASC
